name: maythushar-music
description: A Telegram Music Player Bot, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Get a mongodb url from https://cloud.mongodb.com.

OWNER_ID.description: The user id of user whom you would like to add as OWNER.

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram v2 String Session from @BRANDEDSTRINGSESSION_BOT on Telegram.

TOKEN_ALLOW.description: Fill 'True' if you want to use Token data for play youtube songs, Fill 'False' to use cookies (song will play by cookies)
